nodes.text: The Kuat blockade was a fleet of starships that blockaded the planet Kuat. The blockade was under the command of Admiral Gaarn.

An Executor-class Star Dreadnought, the Annihilator, served as the blockade's flagship. Multiple capital ships, such as Imperial-class Star Destroyers, Victory-class Star Destroyers, Acclamator-class assault ships also served in the fleet. Various support vessels, such as Broadside-class cruisers, Tartan-class patrol cruisers, and Immobilizer 418 cruisers.
Various TIE series models, such as the standard TIE/LN starfighter, TIE/sa bomber, TIE/IN interceptor, and TIE/D Defender were apart of the blockade as well.

The blockade made use of three Cardan V-class space stations, which were mainly used in protection of the yet completed Eclipse, which was an Eclipse-class dreadnought. At least five Plasma Defense Satellites, and three Orbital Repair Satellites were used as well.
